Name: Love Actually
Star: Hugh Grant, Martine McCutcheon, Liam Neeson, Laura Linney
Summary: Follows the lives of eight very different couples in dealing with their love lives in various loosely interrelated tales all set during a frantic month before Christmas in London, England.

Name: The Lost City
Star: Sandra Bullock, Brad Pitt, Daniel Radcliffe, Channing Tatum
Summary: A reclusive romance novelist on a book tour with her cover model gets swept up in a kidnapping attempt that lands them both in a cutthroat jungle adventure.

Name: Emily in Paris
Star: Lily Collins, Philippine Leroy-Beaulieu, Ashley Park, Lucas Bravo
Summary: A young American woman from the Midwest is hired by a marketing firm in Paris to provide them with an American perspective on things.

Name: Licorice Pizza
Star: Alana Haim, Cooper Hoffman, Sean Penn, Tom Waits
Summary: The story of Alana Kane and Gary Valentine growing up, running around and going through the treacherous navigation of first love in the San Fernando Valley, 1973.

Name: The Power of the Dog
Star: Benedict Cumberbatch, Kirsten Dunst, Jesse Plemons, Kodi Smit-McPhee
Summary: Charismatic rancher Phil Burbank inspires fear and awe in those around him. When his brother brings home a new wife and her son, Phil torments them until he finds himself exposed to the possibility of love.

Name: West Side Story
Star: Ansel Elgort, Rachel Zegler, Ariana DeBose, David Alvarez
Summary: An adaptation of the 1957 musical, West Side Story explores forbidden love and the rivalry between the Jets and the Sharks, two teenage street gangs of different ethnic backgrounds.

Name: Elf
Star: Will Ferrell, James Caan, Bob Newhart, Zooey Deschanel
Summary: Raised as an over-sized elf, a human travels from the North Pole to NYC to meet his biological father who doesn't know he exists and is in desperate need of some Christmas spirit.

Name: White Christmas
Star: Bing Crosby, Danny Kaye, Rosemary Clooney, Vera-Ellen
Summary: A successful song-and-dance team become romantically involved with a sister act and team up to save the failing Vermont inn of their former commanding general.

Name: And Just Like That...
Star: Sarah Jessica Parker, Cynthia Nixon, Kristin Davis, Sara Ramirez
Summary: The series will follow Carrie, Miranda and Charlotte as they navigate the journey from the complicated reality of life and friendship in their 30s to the even more complicated reality of life and friendship in their 50s.

Name: The French Dispatch
Star: Benicio Del Toro, Adrien Brody, Tilda Swinton, Léa Seydoux
Summary: A love letter to journalists set in an outpost of an American newspaper in a fictional twentieth century French city that brings to life a collection of stories published in "The French Dispatch Magazine".

Name: Grey's Anatomy
Star: Ellen Pompeo, Chandra Wilson, James Pickens Jr., Justin Chambers
Summary: A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.

Name: Scrooged
Star: Bill Murray, Karen Allen, John Forsythe, John Glover
Summary: A selfish, cynical television executive is haunted by three spirits bearing lessons on Christmas Eve.

Name: The Holiday
Star: Kate Winslet, Cameron Diaz, Jude Law, Jack Black
Summary: Two women troubled with guy-problems swap homes in each other's countries, where they each meet a local guy and fall in love.

Name: Last Christmas
Star: Madison Ingoldsby, Emma Thompson, Boris Isakovic, Lucy Miller
Summary: Kate is a young woman subscribed to bad decisions. Working as an elf in a year round Christmas store is not good for the wannabe singer. However, she meets Tom there. Her life takes a new turn. For Kate, it seems too good to be true.

Name: The Sound of Music
Star: Julie Andrews, Christopher Plummer, Eleanor Parker, Richard Haydn
Summary: A young novitiate is sent by her convent in 1930s Austria to become a governess to the seven children of a widowed naval officer.

Name: Friends
Star: Jennifer Aniston, Courteney Cox, Lisa Kudrow, Matt LeBlanc
Summary: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty-something-year-old friends living in Manhattan.

Name: Single All the Way
Star: Michael Urie, Philemon Chambers, Luke Macfarlane, Barry Bostwick
Summary: Desperate to avoid his family's judgment about his perpetual single status, Peter convinces his best friend Nick to join him for the holidays and pretend that they're now in a relationship.

Name: Love Hard
Star: Nina Dobrev, Jimmy O. Yang, Darren Barnet, James Saito
Summary: An LA girl, unlucky in love, falls for an East Coast guy on a dating app and decides to surprise him for the holidays, only to discover that she's been catfished. This lighthearted romantic comedy chronicles her attempt to reel in love.

Name: Atrangi Re
Star: Dhanush, Sara Ali Khan, Akshay Kumar, Seema Biswas
Summary: A Tamil boy meets a girl from Bihar, what follows is a love story for the ages. A non-linear narrative of two romances running in parallel from different timelines.

Name: Sex and the City
Star: Sarah Jessica Parker, Kim Cattrall, Kristin Davis, Cynthia Nixon
Summary: Four female New Yorkers gossip about their sex lives (or lack thereof) and find new ways to deal with being a woman in the late 1990s.

Name: The Big Bang Theory
Star: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco, Simon Helberg
Summary: A woman who moves into an apartment across the hall from two brilliant but socially awkward physicists shows them how little they know about life outside of the laboratory.

Name: You
Star: Penn Badgley, Victoria Pedretti, Ambyr Childers, Elizabeth Lail
Summary: A dangerously charming, intensely obsessive young man goes to extreme measures to insert himself into the lives of those he is transfixed by.

Name: Vikings
Star: Katheryn Winnick, Gustaf Skarsgård, Alexander Ludwig, Georgia Hirst
Summary: Vikings transports us to the brutal and mysterious world of Ragnar Lothbrok, a Viking warrior and farmer who yearns to explore - and raid - the distant shores across the ocean.

Name: Four Christmases
Star: Reese Witherspoon, Vince Vaughn, Mary Steenburgen, Robert Duvall
Summary: A couple struggles to visit all four of their divorced parents on Christmas.

Name: Modern Family
Star: Ed O'Neill, Sofía Vergara, Julie Bowen, Ty Burrell
Summary: Three different but related families face trials and tribulations in their own uniquely comedic ways.

Name: Downton Abbey
Star: Hugh Bonneville, Phyllis Logan, Elizabeth McGovern, Brendan Coyle
Summary: A chronicle of the lives of the British aristocratic Crawley family and their servants in the early twentieth century.

Name: West Side Story
Star: Natalie Wood, George Chakiris, Richard Beymer, Russ Tamblyn
Summary: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.

Name: Outlander
Star: Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan, Duncan Lacroix, Sophie Skelton
Summary: An English combat nurse from 1945 is mysteriously swept back in time to 1743.

Name: A California Christmas
Star: Lauren Swickard, Josh Swickard, Ali Afshar, David Del Rio
Summary: With his carefree lifestyle on the line, a wealthy charmer poses as a ranch hand to get a hardworking farmer to sell her family's land before Christmas.

Name: A Castle for Christmas
Star: Brooke Shields, Cary Elwes, Lee Ross, Andi Osho
Summary: To escape a scandal, a bestselling author journeys to Scotland, where she falls in love with a castle - and faces off with the grumpy duke who owns it.

Name: A California Christmas: City Lights
Star: Lauren Swickard, Josh Swickard, Ali Afshar, David Del Rio
Summary: Sequel to "A California Christmas". Follows Callie and Joseph one year after they fell in love, now running a dairy farm and winery, but their romance is threatened when business and family obligations call Joseph back to the city.

Name: How I Met Your Mother
Star: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders, Neil Patrick Harris
Summary: A father recounts to his children - through a series of flashbacks - the journey he and his four best friends took leading up to him meeting their mother.

Name: Castle
Star: Nathan Fillion, Stana Katic, Susan Sullivan, Jon Huertas
Summary: After a serial killer imitates the plots of his novels, successful mystery novelist Richard "Rick" Castle receives permission from the Mayor of New York City to tag along with an NYPD homicide investigation team for research purposes.

Name: With Love
Star: Emeraude Toubia, Mark Indelicato, Isis King, Vincent Rodriguez III
Summary: Follows the Diaz siblings, Lily and Jorge, who are on a mission to find love and purpose. The Diaz siblings cross paths with seemingly unrelated residents during some of the most heightened days of the year -the holidays.

Name: Titanic
Star: Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Winslet, Billy Zane, Kathy Bates
Summary: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

Name: 365 Days
Star: Anna Maria Sieklucka, Michele Morrone, Bronislaw Wroclawski, Otar Saralidze
Summary: Massimo is a member of the Sicilian Mafia family and Laura is a sales director. She does not expect that on a trip to Sicily trying to save her relationship, Massimo will kidnap her and give her 365 days to fall in love with him.

Name: Riverdale
Star: Lili Reinhart, Camila Mendes, Cole Sprouse, K.J. Apa
Summary: While navigating the troubled waters of romance, school and family, Archie and his gang become entangled in dark Riverdale mysteries.

Name: The Family Stone
Star: Dermot Mulroney, Sarah Jessica Parker, Claire Danes, Diane Keaton
Summary: An uptight, conservative businesswoman accompanies her boyfriend to his eccentric and outgoing family's annual Christmas celebration and finds that she's a fish out of water in their free-spirited way of life.

Name: The Vampire Diaries
Star: Nina Dobrev, Paul Wesley, Ian Somerhalder, Kat Graham
Summary: The lives, loves, dangers and disasters in the town, Mystic Falls, Virginia. Creatures of unspeakable horror lurk beneath this town as a teenage girl is suddenly torn between two vampire brothers.

Name: Mistletoe Mixup
Star: Danielle C. Ryan, Joey Lawrence, Matthew Lawrence, Andrew Lawrence
Summary: A workaholic with no time for romance, or the holidays ends up meeting two potential suitors on the same day, but unbeknownst to her, they turn out to be brothers. A sibling squabble commences in this holiday romance.

Name: Dickinson
Star: Hailee Steinfeld, Adrian Enscoe, Anna Baryshnikov, Jane Krakowski
Summary: An inside look at the world of writer Emily Dickinson.

Name: Holidate
Star: Emma Roberts, Luke Bracey, Kristin Chenoweth, Frances Fisher
Summary: Fed up with being single on holidays, two strangers agree to be each other's platonic plus-ones all year long, only to catch real feelings along the way.

Name: Love
Star: Aomi Muyock, Karl Glusman, Klara Kristin, Juan Saavedra
Summary: Murphy is an American living in Paris who enters a highly sexually and emotionally charged relationship with Electra. Unaware of the effect it will have on their relationship, they invite their pretty neighbor into their bed.

Name: Little Women
Star: Saoirse Ronan, Emma Watson, Florence Pugh, Eliza Scanlen
Summary: Jo March reflects back and forth on her life, telling the beloved story of the March sisters - four young women, each determined to live life on her own terms.

Name: Bones
Star: Emily Deschanel, David Boreanaz, Michaela Conlin, T.J. Thyne
Summary: Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.

Name: ER
Star: Anthony Edwards, George Clooney, Julianna Margulies, Eriq La Salle
Summary: The lives, loves and losses of the doctors and nurses of Chicago's County General Hospital.

Name: Bridgerton
Star: Phoebe Dynevor, Regé-Jean Page, Nicola Coughlan, Jonathan Bailey
Summary: Wealth, lust, and betrayal set against the backdrop of Regency-era England, seen through the eyes of the powerful Bridgerton family.

Name: Two and a Half Men
Star: Jon Cryer, Ashton Kutcher, Angus T. Jones, Conchata Ferrell
Summary: A hedonistic jingle writer's free-wheeling life comes to an abrupt halt when his brother and 10-year-old nephew move into his beach-front house.

Name: Superman and Lois
Star: Tyler Hoechlin, Elizabeth Tulloch, Jordan Elsass, Alex Garfin
Summary: Follow the world's most famous super hero and comic books' most famous journalist as they deal with all the stress, pressures, and complexities that come with being working parents in today's society.

Name: The Worst Person in the World
Star: Renate Reinsve, Anders Danielsen Lie, Maria Grazia Di Meo, Mia McGovern Zaini
Summary: The chronicles of four years in the life of Julie, a young woman who navigates the troubled waters of her love life and struggles to find her career path, leading her to take a realistic look at who she really is.
